1.1.0 (2014-01-28 UTC)

- Add config file support
  - Command line options have precedence
- Add more command line options
  - -c, --config FILE
  - -h, --help
  - -m, --multiline
  - -s, --dotsize
  - -w, --viewer 'COMMAND'
- Add proper bash completion
- Add some output to verbose mode
- Attempt to find viewer automatically if none is set
- Exit immediately if no pass-name is given
- Greatly improve usage message
- Clean up makefile, add uninstall target
